extDesc.message: Características y estilos personalizados para Roblox.

extUpdate.description: Text shows then clicking on Extension icon. text will show then the extension is not up-to-date. this will be under 'Open Settings Menu' button

extUpdate1.description: Text shows then clicking on Extension icon. text will show then the extension is not up-to-date. this will be under the new update text

refresh.description: Text shows on a button at filtered servers on game page

LowPingSvrs.description: Text shows on a button at filtered servers on game page

openSettingsMenu.description: Text shows then you click on the extension. clicking it will open settings menu

errorCode.description: Error occured and error code will be next to it. Example: QFR11

errorNameLength.message: ¡El nombre debe tener entre 3 y 24 caracteres!
errorNameLength.description: the user input should be in a specific range

errorDescLength.message: ¡La longitud máxima de la descripción es de 36 caracteres!
errorDescLength.description: the user input should be in a specific range

errorAtoZ.description: the user input should be in a specific letters

errorMaxSlots.description: User doesn't have enough space for themes

btnEdit.description: Text Shows on Roblokis Settings at Designer Tab. clicking it will open edit menu for the themes

btnSelect.description: Text Shows on Roblokis Settings at Designer Tab. clicking it will select the theme

btnCancel.description: Text Shows on Roblokis Settings at Designer Tab. clicking it will cancel your action

btnDelete.description: Text Shows on Roblokis Settings at Designer Tab. clicking it will delete your theme

btnSaved.description: Text shows in roblokis settings. Shows then settings are saved

btnSave.description: Text shows in roblokis settings. Shows on a button to save settings

copyTextSuccess.description: Text shows then copying links/text. Copying text was successful

copyTextUnseccuss.description: Text shows then copying links/text. Copying text was unsuccessful

cantCopyText.description: Text shows then copying links/text. Couldn't copy text

badgeNoDescription.description: Text shows on game badges. badge doesn't have a description

badgeNoName.description: Text shows on game badges. badge doesn't have a name

badgeRare.description: Text shows on game badges. how rare is this badge to get

badgeLastWon.description: Text shows on game badges. how many players got this badge from yesterday

badgeWon.description: Text shows on game badges. how many players have this badge

badgeAchievedShort.description: Text shows on game badges. Next to it will be the date of when the player got the badge

badgeAchievedLong.description: Text shows then you hover over game badges. a longer date will be showen in the placeholder

badgeCreatedShort.description: Text shows on game badges. Next to it will be the date of when the badge was created

badgeCreatedLong.description: Text shows then you hover over game badges. a longer date will be showen in the placeholder

badgeUpdatedShort.description: Text shows on game badges. Next to it will be the date of when the badge got updated

badgeUpdatedLong.description: Text shows then you hover over game badges. a longer date will be showen in the placeholder

joinButtons.description: Text shows on games/servers button. clicking it would join your roblox game

cancelRequest.description: Text shows on profile at'Pending' button. cancels a friend request

canceledRequest.description: Text shows on profile at'Pending' button. canceled the friend request

lastGame.description: Text shows on profiles. under it will be the game join button

lastPlace.description: Text shows on profiles. under it will be the last game name

lastSeen.description: Text shows on profiles. under it will be the last date player was seen

lastSeenLong.description: Text shows then you hover over last seen text in profile page. a longer date will be showen in the placeholder

smallSection.description: Text shows on game servers. the small servers section name

slowServer.description: Text shows on servers. only shows then the server is slow

loadMore.description: Text shows on game servers section. clicking it will load more servers

joinPrivateServer.description: Text shows on friends servers. text shows when your friend is in a private server

JoinPublicServer.description: Text shows on friends servers. text shows when your friend is in a public server
